alert.note: Alert for Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 17 at 2:48PM CDT until April 18 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 436 AND 437... .The combination of gusty winds, warm temperatures and low humidity will create near-critical fire weather conditions. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH EARLY TUESDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 436 AND 437... The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Tuesday afternoon through early Tuesday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zones 436 and 437. * WIND...Southwest 15 to 25 MPH with gusts to 30 MPH. * HUMIDITY...Minimum 12 to 15 percent. * HAINES...5 to 6. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Lodgepole Creek, Southern Nebraska Panhandle; Lower North Platte River Basin, Scottsbluff National Monument
